relation: NTC Brown Book, Fire Alarm Systems Design and Installation Fire alarm system design and installation is complex and governed by national and local codes. The NTC Brown Book makes understanding these complexities easy. This reference covers all aspects of fire alarm systems including planning, documentation, contracts, design and installation.

NTC Red Book, Fire Alarm Certification Guide NICET Levels 1-4 The NTC Red Book is specifically designed for those Studying for NICET Certification in fire alarm systems. This extremely effective reference is specifically designed for those studying for Certification Testing.

NTC Orange Book, Chuck Notes to the Fire Alarm Codes Chuck Notes is well known in the industry as the most important fire alarm systems reference for code requirements. Chuck Notes is easy to use and assists you in finding requirements quickly. This book is based on code requirements for fire alarm systems and includes life safety requirements and electrical requirements.

NTC Blue Book, Security System Design and Installation The NTC Blue Book is the authority on low voltage systems. This one of a kind reference provides important information on a wide variety of modern electronic systems. This book includes application based information. It is designed to provide workable solutions for the technical challenges presented in the low voltage industry today.

NTC Yellow Book, CCTV Systems Design and Installation The NTC Yellow Book is the most complete applications based reference available to the industry today. This highly specialized book takes the mystery out of CCTV design and places a common sense, applications based systems approach to the design process.

NTC Purple Book Access Control System Design and Installation This amazing reference provides the detailed technical information you need to know for access control systems. The NTC Purple Book is designed for all industry professionals involved in Access Control Systems. This book includes:

NTC Green Book, Residential Audio Video Systems The NTC Green Book is the source for Residential Audio Video System Design & Installation. This amazing reference is the first complete guide to these popular systems. The residential A/V market is one of the fastest growng product categories in the industry and now you have the knowledge and the power to seize this opportunity.
pageTitle: Fire Alarm, Security and A/V Design & Installation | Electrical Construction & Maintenance (EC&M) Magazine
